attributes.action: The government imposing a road tax on mobility scooters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason being, that they are dangerous, if the owner doesnt know how to drive these vehicles. There is a number of disabled drive on the roads, should they not be road taxed? they even use their indicators at the end of road junctions! Somthing has to be done on this tax dodging situation

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
